snippet: The plan to offer high-definition movies three weeks sooner, at a lower price than at present, is a bid by the film studio to revive consumer interest in movie purchases.
abstract: Fox Filmed Entertainment plans to offer high-definition versions of its films for sale at newly lowered prices about three weeks before making the movies available on discs and through video-on-demand services; new system is an aggressive bid to revive consumers' interest in movie purchases.
lead_paragraph: The plan to offer high-definition movies three weeks sooner, at a lower price than at present, is a bid by the film studio to revive consumer interest in movie purchases.

headline.seo: Fox to Offer Digital Movies Closer to Theater Release
headline.main: Fox to Offer Digital Movies Closer to Theatrical Release
headline.print_headline: Fox to Offer Digital Movies Closer to Theatrical Release
